SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.history

Class RepositoryInfo

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.history.RepositoryInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Repository
public class RepositoryInfo extends Object implements Serializable
Class to contain the common info for a repository. This object will live on the server and the client side, so don't add logic that will only work on one side in this object.
Author:
Trond Norbye
See Also:

      whether merge commits are supported

      public boolean isWorking()
